subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: After drifting in and out of golf, Warren Bladon, who appeared on the Golf Channel reality series "Final Cut IV," has won a spot in this year's British Open.
snippet: After drifting in and out of golf, Warren Bladon, who appeared on the Golf Channel reality series "Final Cut IV," has won a spot in this year's British Open.
